===Character Plunging Attacks===
Meaning of terms:

*Mid-Air refers to Plunge DMG, which is the damage caused while the character is in mid-air.
*Low Impact refers to Low Plunge DMG, which is the damage caused by AoE Impact when the character hits the ground.
*High Impact refers to High Plunge DMG, which is the damage caused by AoE Impact when the character hits the ground.

When the height is above 2.4 m, the character will do High Plunging Attacks. Otherwise, the character will do Low Plunging Attacks.

==Examples==
Example 1:

Razor Normal Attack 1-3 Hit + Bennett Charge Level 1  > Stonehide Lawachurl

[[File:poiseExample 1.gif]]

Example 2:

Electro-Charged 2 hits = Abyss Mage dancing

[[File:poiseExample 2.gif]]

Example 3:

Electro-Charged 2 hits + Diluc Skill 1st Hit > Cryogunner Legionnaire generating shield

[[File:poiseExample 3.gif]]

Example 4:

Diluc Skill 1st Hit + Diluc Normal Attack 1 Hit + Diluc Skill 2nd Hit = Cryogunner Legionnaire generating shield

[[File:poiseExample 4.gif]]

Example 5:

Some Poise Damage + Thunder + Overload + Electro-Charged. They made a Stonehide Lawachurl spin in the air.

[[File:poiseExample 5.gif]]
